title: spaghetti
directions: stir occasionally and let boil for approx 10 mins
Remove from heat and drain water from pasta
Heat Ragu according to directions on jar

title: pizza
directions: if you think 8 would be too filling slice into 4 pieces
and remember, it's not delivery, it's Digiorno!

title: tomato soup
directions: Use can opener to open can
Empty into a microwave safe bowl

title: wish sandwich
directions: While holding bread use wish to wish for meat

title: ricochet biscuit
directions: If biscuit doesn't bounce back into your mouth, you go hungry!
